data.comment: The match is underway at Mandemakers Stadion.
The match is underway at Mandemakers Stadion.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Utrecht in the half of Waalwijk.
Clint Leemans gets his shot on target but fails to score for Waalwijk.
Free kick for Utrecht in their own half.
Jochem Kamphuis awards Waalwijk a goal kick.
Can Utrecht capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Waalwijk's Melle Meulensteen has been booked in Waalwijk.
Utrecht's Urby Emanuelson breaks free at Mandemakers Stadion. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Waalwijk.
Utrecht to take a throw-in in Waalwijk territory.
Ball goes out of play for a Waalwijk goal kick.
Jochem Kamphuis signals a Waalwijk throw-in in Utrecht's half.
Throw-in for Waalwijk at Mandemakers Stadion.
Can Utrecht get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Waalwijk's half?
Waalwijk awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Waalwijk in the half of Utrecht.
Waalwijk's Richard van der Venne gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Utrecht at Mandemakers Stadion.
Waalwijk have been awarded a corner by Jochem Kamphuis.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Waalwijk in the half of Utrecht.
Can Utrecht get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Waalwijk's half?
Sylla Sow (Waalwijk) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
Kristoffer Peterson for Utrecht gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Waalwijk have a goal kick.
Utrecht's Sander Van de Streek gets in a shot on goal at Mandemakers Stadion. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Utrecht are in shooting range from this free kick.
Utrecht attack but Gyrano Kerk's header doesn't find the target.
Jochem Kamphuis awards Waalwijk a goal kick.
Gyrano Kerk puts the ball in the net and the away team now lead 0-1.
Jochem Kamphuis signals a Waalwijk throw-in in Utrecht's half.
Throw-in for Waalwijk in their own half.
Waalwijk needs to be cautious. Utrecht have an attacking throw-in.
Jochem Kamphuis signals a free kick to Waalwijk just outside Utrecht's area.
Throw-in Utrecht.
Jochem Kamphuis signals a free kick to Utrecht in their own half.
Utrecht are caught offside.
Waalwijk have a dangerous throw-in.
Utrecht have a goal kick.
Waalwijk awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Waalwijk Waalwijk drive forward through Anas Tahiri. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Sylla Sow for Waalwijk drives towards goal at Mandemakers Stadion. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Waalwijk's Paul Quasten gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Utrecht defender.
Ball safe as Waalwijk is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Utrecht to take a throw-in in Waalwijk territory.
Paul Quasten (Waalwijk) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Simon Gustafson is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Utrechtâ€™s Simon Gustafson is on his feet again at Mandemakers Stadion.
Waalwijk awarded a free kick in their own half.
Jochem Kamphuis awards the away team a throw-in.
Ball goes out of play for a Utrecht goal kick.
Throw-in for Utrecht in their own half.
1 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Waalwijk.
Goal kick for Utrecht at Mandemakers Stadion.
The first-half has ended.
The second-half is underway at Mandemakers Stadion.
Free kick for Waalwijk in their own half.
In Waalwijk Waalwijk attack through Melle Meulensteen. The finish is off target, however.
Throw-in Utrecht.
Utrecht to take a throw-in in Waalwijk territory.
Ball safe as Utrecht is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Jochem Kamphuis awards the away team a throw-in.
Utrecht awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Waalwijk at Mandemakers Stadion.
Emil Hansson for Waalwijk drives towards goal at Mandemakers Stadion. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Utrecht push forward at Mandemakers Stadion and Issah Abass gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Waalwijk defence.
Corner awarded to Utrecht.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Waalwijk.
Throw-in for Utrecht in their own half.
Free kick Utrecht.
Jochem Kamphuis signals a free kick to Waalwijk in their own half.
Important block from the Utrecht defence as Stanley Elbers fires in a strike for Waalwijk.
Utrecht will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Waalwijk.
Waalwijk are pushing forward but Clint Leemans's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Utrecht goal kick.
Throw-in Waalwijk.
Throw-in for Waalwijk at Mandemakers Stadion.
Bart Ramselaar is replacing Kristoffer Peterson for the away team.
Joris Overeem is replacing Issah Abass for Utrecht at Mandemakers Stadion.
Jochem Kamphuis awards Utrecht a goal kick.
Fred Grim (Waalwijk) is making a first substitution, with Darren Maatsen replacing Stanley Elbers.
Ball safe as Waalwijk is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in high up the field for Waalwijk in Waalwijk.
Utrecht awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Jochem Kamphuis awards the away team a throw-in.
Waalwijk awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Utrecht in their own half.
Emil Hansson of Waalwijk gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Waalwijk.
Utrecht awarded a free kick in their own half.
Waalwijk's Sylla Sow has been booked in Waalwijk and will miss the next match through suspension.
Waalwijk make their second substitution with Tijani Reijnders replacing Richard van der Venne.
Goal! The home team draw level at 1-1 through Sylla Sow.
That's a fine assist from Tijani Reijnders.
Throw-in for Utrecht at Mandemakers Stadion.
Can Utrecht get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Waalwijk's half?
Throw-in Waalwijk.
Jochem Kamphuis signals a Waalwijk throw-in in Utrecht's half.
Jochem Kamphuis awards the away team a throw-in.
Can Waalwijk capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Utrecht's half?
Goal! Darren Maatsen gives Waalwijk a 2-1 lead.
Paul Quasten with an assist there.
Jochem Kamphuis signals a throw-in for Utrecht, close to Waalwijk's area.
In Waalwijk a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Throw-in for Utrecht in the half of Waalwijk.
The match at Mandemakers Stadion has been interrupted briefly for a check on Etienne Vaessen, who is down injured.
Etienne Vaessen returns to the field for Waalwijk after picking up a slight injury.
John van den Brom is making the team's third substitution at Mandemakers Stadion with Jonas Arweiler replacing Urby Emanuelson.
Waalwijk have been awarded a corner by Jochem Kamphuis.
Corner awarded to Waalwijk.
Throw-in for Utrecht in their own half.
Utrecht's Sander Van de Streek gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Waalwijk at Mandemakers Stadion.
Waalwijk have a goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Utrecht drive upfield and Bart Ramselaar gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Waalwijk defender.
Jochem Kamphuis signals a free kick to Utrecht.
Anas Tahiri for Waalwijk has been booked by Jochem Kamphuis and receives a first yellow card.
Corner awarded to Utrecht.
Gyrano Kerk for Utrecht is whistled offside.
Ball safe as Utrecht is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The home team have replaced Emil Hansson with Hans Mulder. This is the third substitution made today by Fred Grim.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Jochem Kamphuis signals a free kick to Waalwijk in their own half.
In Waalwijk a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Throw-in for Waalwijk in the half of Utrecht.
Utrecht awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Jonas Arweiler's header is off-target for Utrecht.
Goal kick for Waalwijk at Mandemakers Stadion.
Jochem Kamphuis awards the away team a throw-in.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
The second-half is over. The match ends 2-1.
